item.title: Day1
item.description: Adventures in Sarrolen Day 1 - Setup From the diary of Elder Alfred Duncan We’ve been here fifty years. At least, that’s as far back as any of us can remember. Some of us have been here the entire memory, and they were adults then. It doesn’t make sense. Some of those born the first year of our memory look younger than some of the now dead looked when we first remember.
